transcript:
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hello. Hello. Haan ji.
Executive: Ji, ha ji, good afternoon sir. Main Naveen baat kar raha tha. Senior manager IndiaMART se. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Thik hai ji.
Executive: Ji, ha sir. Actually sir, mera discussion aap se abhi kuch din pehle hua tha aapki service ko lekar.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: And maine ek whatsapp group bhi create karaya tha sir jahan pe kuch details aapne share ki thi sir. Uh, kuch excel hume mili thi aapko yaad hoga, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To basically sir, jo uh, uh, concern aapne bataya tha sir wo export leads ko lekar hai aur jo hamara discussion hua hai sir, uh, iske regarding, uh, shayad aap export leads ka jo excel hai wo bhi aapne bola hai share karne ke liye, aapki team ne bola hai hume.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Uh, we will be closely monitoring this, uh, uh, in future sir. Jo excel aap bhej rahe hain, maine jaise aapko inform kiya tha sir, koi bhi uh, further aage se koi issue aata hai kisi lead ya enquiry ko lekar, uh, in fact to aap is group pe aage se uh, dalna shuru kariye. Aapka staff bhi wahan pe available hai, unko bhi ye cheez bataiyega.
Customer: Uh hmm hmm.
Executive: And as I told you sir ki jo ye aapne bataya tha sir ki kuch customer hai, buyer hai jo reply nahi karte, response nahi dete hain. Uh, uske multiple factors hote hain sir. Market mein already sir wo multiple supplier se connected hote hain and jaise ki wo IndiaMART pe requirement post kar rahe hote hain, aise hi unke paas other platform bhi hote hain jahan wo requirement dalte hain.
Customer: Aap wo immediately nahi kar rahe hain na. Hamara staff usi ke liye baitha hai IndiaMART ke liye. Immediately aaya aur kar diya. Uske baad bhi no response aana. Humse fast mujhe nahi lagta koi karta hai.
Executive: [inaudible] mere ko to pata hi hai.
Customer: Lekin itna work karne ke baad bhi response nahi aayega to koi fayda nahi hai na. Koi matlab nahi hai aur export lead mein ek saal ho gaya. Main kitni baar bolu ki ek bhi, ek bhi lead nahi aa raha hai, nahi bhi response aa raha hai to isko aap band karo ya payment ka kuch karao. Mera to lakh rupaye ka seedha seedha nuksan hai.

summary:
Concerns:

- No export leads or responses in a year.

- Wants to close the export subscription.

- Claims a loss of one lakh rupees.

- Staff wasting time on IndiaMART leads.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concern.

- Executive asked the customer to share excel.

- Executive assured to call back after checking.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after checking the excel.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- export leads, refund, subscription, excel
